title: Update native-dependency-update skill with guardrails
body:
## Summary

Adds guardrails to the native-dependency-update skill to prevent common mistakes.

## Changes

- Add mandatory 'Follow Every Phase' section at top
- Add pre-flight checklist to confirm proper process
- Add 'NEVER Do These' table of common shortcuts
- Add explicit warnings against pushing directly to skiasharp/main
- Emphasize cgmanifest.json is required
- Emphasize native build phase is required (CI is too slow)
- Clarify 'do everything' means 'follow every step'
- Add 'Fixes #NNNNN' guidance for auto-closing issues
- Add rule: never revert/force push shared branches
